          <title>
            <string language="fr">Transmission des rayons X et des rayons de gamma par le  corps</string>
            <string language="en">Transmission of X-rays and gamma rays through the body</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung der Röntgenstrahlen und der 
Gammastrahlen durch den Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão dos raios X e dos raios do gamma 
através do corpo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione dei raggi X e dei raggi di gamma 
attraverso il corpo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάδοση των ακτίνων X και των ακτίνων γάμμα μέσω 
του σώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión de radiografías y de rayos de la 
gamma a través del cuerpo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les rayons X et les  rayons de gamma peuvent passer à travers votre corps.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that X-rays and gamma rays can pass through your body.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">absorption</string>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">corps</string>
            <string language="en">Body</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cancer</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons X</string>
            <string language="en">X-rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Röntgenstrahlen und 
Gammastrahlen durch Ihren Körper überschreiten können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os raios X e os raios 
do gamma podem passar através de seu corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i raggi X ed i 
raggi di gamma possono passare attraverso il vostro corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι ακτίνες X και οι 
ακτίνες γάμμα μπορούν να περάσουν μέσω του σώματός σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las radiografías y
los rayos de la gamma pueden pasar a través de su cuerpo.</string>
          </description>
